name: Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee
desc: IIT Roorkee, located in Roorkee, Uttarakhand, is one of the oldest technical institutions in India. Renowned for its academic excellence and robust research programs, it offers a conducive environment for innovation and learning.

name: National Institute of Technology, Calicut
desc: NIT Calicut, situated in Kozhikode, Kerala, is a premier technical institute known for its quality education and research. With a focus on fostering technical skills and innovation, it prepares students for successful careers in engineering and technology.

name: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
desc: IIT Kharagpur, situated in Kharagpur, West Bengal, is one of the premier engineering institutes in India. Known for its academic excellence and research contributions, it offers a conducive environment for innovation and technological advancement.

name: School of Planning and Architecture, New Delhi
desc: SPA Delhi, located in New Delhi, Delhi, is a premier institution for architectural and planning education. With a focus on creativity and sustainability, it prepares students to address contemporary urban challenges and contribute to the built environment.

name: National Institute of Technology, Tiruchirappalli
desc: NIT Trichy, situated in Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, is a leading technical institution known for its academic excellence and industry interface. With state-of-the-art facilities and experienced faculty, it nurtures talent and fosters innovation in engineering and technology.

name: Indian Institute of Engineering Science and Technology, Shibpur
desc: IIEST Shibpur, located in Howrah, West Bengal, is an esteemed technical institution with a rich heritage. With a focus on research and industry collaboration, it offers a dynamic learning environment and prepares students for leadership roles in engineering and technology.

name: School of Planning & Architecture, Vijayawada
desc: SPA Vijayawada, situated in Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh, is a premier institution for architectural and planning education. With a focus on design excellence and sustainable development, it prepares students to address complex urban challenges and contribute to the built environment.

name: Visvesvaraya National Institute of Technology, Nagpur
desc: VNIT Nagpur, located in Nagpur, Maharashtra, is a leading technical institute known for its academic excellence and industry partnerships. With a focus on holistic development and innovation, it prepares students for successful careers in engineering and technology.

name: Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi
desc: Jamia Millia Islamia, situated in New Delhi, Delhi, is a reputed central university known for its academic diversity and cultural inclusivity. With a focus on social justice and empowerment, it provides students with opportunities for academic and personal growth.

name: School of Planning and Architecture, Bhopal
desc: SPA Bhopal, located in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, is a premier institution for architectural and planning education. With a focus on innovation and sustainability, it equips students with the skills and knowledge to address contemporary urban challenges and contribute to sustainable development.

name: S.R.M. Institute of Science and Technology
